attributes.action: Make the Halifax Bank use the money given by the Government to help customers in financial difficulties, instead of doing nothing and charging extortionate bank charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Halifax Bank was bailed out by the Government, using our money.

This Bank does nothing in return to help its struggling customers.

Instead they refuse to help them, and charge them extortionate charges.

Make them stop this and make them help help their customers.
